subject: Initial discovery call
content: Discussed current challenges with data management and integration needs. Sarah mentioned they're evaluating 3 vendors and timeline is Q1.

subject: Technical requirements document
content: Sent comprehensive technical requirements document. Michael confirmed they'll review with their engineering team by end of week.

subject: Product demonstration
content: Conducted 90-minute product demo for Emily and 3 team members. Very positive reception, especially around automation features. Next step: pricing discussion.

subject: Competitive analysis
content: David mentioned they're also considering two other solutions. Our differentiator is the startup-friendly pricing model and faster implementation time.

subject: ROI calculations
content: Sent detailed ROI analysis showing 18-month payback period. Lisa requested additional security compliance documentation.

subject: Budget discussion
content: James confirmed budget approval for Q1. Discussed implementation timeline and resource allocation. Very positive conversation.

subject: Contract negotiation
content: Met with Maria and legal team to discuss contract terms. Agreed on most points, minor revisions needed on SLA terms. Expected to close this week.

subject: Executive summary
content: Sent executive summary to Robert highlighting strategic benefits and competitive advantages. He'll present to board next week.

subject: Proposal follow-up
content: Sarah provided feedback on proposal. Requested modifications to payment terms and additional training hours. Will send revised proposal by Friday.

subject: Implementation planning
content: Michael confirmed go-ahead for technical integration phase. Their dev team is available for kick-off meeting next Monday.
